entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @cnnbrk Oh my gosh—Dr. Fauci will begin a modified quarantine after a low risk contact. Prayers for Dr. Fauci 🙏🏼The White House is a Hotspot—Trump & everyone there are wearing no masks. 😷How many staffers have now tested positive for #COVID19 I’m curious why is Trump testing negative?
